question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. guardrail
B. billboard
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The billboard is positioned on the left side of the image, closer to the foreground, while the guardrail is on the right side and appears to be further back in the scene, behind the airplane and other distant elements, making its depth relationship clear without needing a depth map.
